testcase.classname: To validate login functionality of facebook
testcase.name: validate with invalid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given The user should launch the chrome browser.............................passed When The person should type the url.........................................passed And The user should maximize the window.....................................passed And The user should type the invalid username and invalid passwords.........passed And The user should click the login button..................................passed And The user should get the title of the incorrect credential page..........passed Then The user should navigate to incorrect credential page..................passed
